member.name: M:Polynomials.Domain.Polynomial.#ctor(System.Double[])
member.summary: Constructor for initializing polynomial elements. The array element index is the degree of the polynomial.

member.name: M:Polynomials.Domain.Polynomial.#ctor(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Constructor for initializing polynomial elements in quotient remainder format. The array element index is the degree of the polynomial.

member.name: P:Polynomials.Domain.Polynomial.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Access polynomial elements by index. Where the index number is the degree of the polynomial.
member.returns: The element with a given index.

member.name: M:Polynomials.Domain.Polynomial.op_Division(Polynomials.Domain.Polynomial,Polynomials.Domain.Polynomial)
member.summary: The method of dividing a polynomial into a polynomial. Where polynomial index is degree.
member.returns: Returns the new polynomial in the quotient remainder format.

member.name: M:Polynomials.Domain.Polynomial.op_Multiply(Polynomials.Domain.Polynomial,Polynomials.Domain.Polynomial)
member.summary: The method of multiplication a polynomial into a polynomial. Where polynomial index is degree.

member.name: M:Polynomials.Domain.Polynomial.op_Addition(Polynomials.Domain.Polynomial,Polynomials.Domain.Polynomial)
member.summary: Method for summing a polynomial into a polynomial. Where polynomial index is degree.

member.name: M:Polynomials.Domain.Polynomial.op_Subtraction(Polynomials.Domain.Polynomial,Polynomials.Domain.Polynomial)
member.summary: Method for substracting a polynomial from polynomial. Where polynomial index is degree.

member.name: M:Polynomials.Domain.Polynomial.SumPolynomialElementsWithArray(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Method for summing a polinomial elements with an array. Where polynomial elements index is degree.
member.param: Array for summing with a polynomial elements.
member.returns: Returns the summation of polynomial elements with array elements.

member.name: M:Polynomials.Domain.Polynomial.SubtractionPolynomialElementsFromArray(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Subtracting a polynomial from an array. Where polynomial elements index is degree.
member.param: Array for summing with a polynomial elements.
member.returns: Returns the substracion of polynomial elements from array elements.
